short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Easy to go extension! A new tab organised with all your information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An Easy to go extension! A new tab organised with all your information.
We organize all your information when you open a new tab. We show your history, bookmarks and your most viewed sites in a user friendly interface.
We show your Topsites in an organized pattern which will allow you to launch all of them in single click.

Now the launcher icon will launch duplicate tab of the current tab!
